thread.title: Adams Resources & Energy, Inc. Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Adams Resources & Energy, Inc. Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
HOUSTON, Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Adams Resources & Energy, Inc. (NYSE MKT: AE) ("Adams" or the "Company") today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend in the amount of $0.22 per common share of 2017, payable on March 23, 2018 to shareholders of record as of close of business on March 9, 2018.
Adams Resources & Energy, Inc. is engaged in the business of crude oil marketing, transportation and storage, tank truck transportation of liquid chemicals and dry bulk and ISO tank container storage and transportation. For more information, visit www.adamsresources.com .
